item.name: Castellan staf
entries: Needs attunement
+1 magical focus.
Wielding this staff grants the wielder proficiency to persuasion if they aren't already proficient with the stat. The proficiency is doubled if the wielder is already proficient with persuasion.
This staff allows the wielder to cast Misty Step once per short rest.

Once per long rest, the wielder can send a wave of dark energy in a 20ft cone. Creatures inside the cone must make a wisdom save (at your dc). When they fail, they'll take 4d6 Necrotic damage and are stunned until the start of your next turn. They only take half damage on a save.

item.name: Ethereal candle
entries: De kaars kan enkel worden aangestoken met een spreukwoord en geeft een donker blauwe vlam af. De vlam is niet met water te doven en is enkel te doven door middel van het spreukwoord of door middel van zand. De kaars brand niet met hitte, maar met magie en het licht brand genoeg om 10ft helder te kunnen zien. Tevens worden binnen die 10ft onzichtbare creatures en wezens in de Aethereal plane zichtbaar.

item.name: Shadowglass Dagger
entries: Finesse, light, thrown (20/60 ft.)
On a hit with this weapon the target takes 1d4 piercing + 1d4 necrotic damage.

This dagger can be used to restrain a creature, large or smaller, through its shadow. You make a melee or ranged attack targeting a creature's shadow. It must save agaiinst a dex saving throw with a DC of (8+ proficiency + dex or str modifier) if it fails the creature is restrained until the dagger is removed from the shadow.
